channel.title: Performance on My Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on My Hugo

item.title: Performance Monitors
item.description: Ref: The Geek Stuff - Performance Monitoring Toools Brendan’s Linux Performance WSL/ubuntu perf doesn’t work after installing in WSL2/ubuntu. sudo apt install linux-oem-5.6-tools-common perf WARNING: perf not found for kernel 4.19.128-microsoft You may need to install the following packages for this specific kernel: linux-tools-4.19.128-microsoft-standard linux-cloud-tools-4.19.128-microsoft-standard You may also want to install one of the following packages to keep up to date: linux-tools-standard linux-cloud-tools-standard No lucks to install linux-tools-4.19.128-microsoft-standard, not build from microsoft perf source.
